item.title: git submodule (1)
item.description: The git submodule update --init is nice. I checked how all these repos are managed. If I want to move submodule, I don’t need delete and clone again. I can simply move it with “git mv <oldpath> <newpath>” while we keep using the same local copy of repo. Let’s see how this is done. <modulename>/.gitmodules This file is checked in to the parent Git repository and contains: [submodule "pack/github/opt/ale"] path = pack/ale url = https://github.
